list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the fire was caused by someone dropping a lighted cigarette
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: ngọn lửa được gây ra bởi một người nào đó thả một điếu thuốc thắp sáng

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the spoon dropped with a clatter from her hand
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: cái muỗng rơi với một tiếng kêu từ tay cô

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make or become lower, weaker, or less.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he dropped his voice as she came into the room
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta thả giọng nói khi cô vào phòng.

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: abandon or discontinue (a course of action or study).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the charges against him were dropped last year
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các cáo buộc chống lại anh ta đã bị loại bỏ vào năm ngoái

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: set down or unload (a passenger or goods), especially on the way to somewhere else.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his mom dropped him outside and drove off to work
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Mẹ anh buông anh ra ngoài và lái xe đi làm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in sports) fail to win (a point, game, or match).
be forced to play (a relatively high card) as a loser under an opponent's higher card, because it is the only card in its suit held in the hand.
a small round or pear-shaped portion of liquid that hangs or falls or adheres to a surface.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the first drops of rain splashed on the ground
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Những giọt mưa đầu tiên bắn tung tóe trên mặt đất

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an instance of falling or dropping.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they left within five minutes of the drop of the curtain
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Họ để lại trong vòng năm phút sau giọt rèm

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I got to the depot and made the drop
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đã đến kho và thực hiện thả

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a piece of candy or a lozenge.
an earring that hangs down from the earlobe.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Amethyst đơn giản và giọt kim cương

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a section of theatrical scenery lowered from the flies; a drop cloth or drop curtain.
a trapdoor on a gallows, the opening of which causes the prisoner to fall and thus be hanged.
